item.title: When SideChannelMarvels meets LIEF
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: On how we used LIEF to lift an Android x86_64 library to Linux to perform our usual white-box attacks on it.

item.title: How to use frida on a non-rooted device
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: This post explains how to use Frida gadget on a non-rooted device.
